Name: Das hässliche Entlein
Notes: Märchenoper/Fairy tale opera in 6 Szenen auf ein Libretto von Doris Dörrie
Instrumentation: small choir (2 sopranos, alto and baritone)
Long Description: Entertaining children's opera in the "old" style. For soprano, 2 mezzosopranos, tenor, one untrained singer (male or female) and small choir (2 sopranos, A and Bar). With either a reduced orchestra (strings and continuo), or full ensemble (strings, continuo, clarinet, trumpet, alto saxophone, basson, harp and percussion).
Short Description: Märchenoper/Fairy tale opera in 6 Szenen auf ein Libretto von Doris Dörrie
